name: Jagged Knife Hexer
flavor: A staff-wielding bandit in a cloak adorned with magical paraphernalia, using curses to vex their foes.

features.name: Curse - Action
features.desc: Choose a target within Far range and temporarily Curse them. While the target is Cursed, you can mark a Stress so that target rolls with Hope to make the roll be with Fear instead.

features.name: Chaotic Flux - Action
features.desc: Make an attack against up to three targets within Very Close range. Mark a Stress to deal 2d6+3 magic damage to targets the Hexer succeeded against.
